channel.title: SigNoz
channel.description: SigNoz is an open-source observability tool powered by OpenTelemetry. Get APM, logs, traces, metrics, exceptions, & alerts in a single tool.

item.title: Graylog vs Loki - Choosing the Right Log Management Tool
item.description: Compare Graylog and Loki for log management. Learn key differences, use cases, and how to choose the best tool for your needs.
item.author: hello@signoz.io (SigNoz Inc)

item.title: How to Use Regex in Grafana Queries - A Step-by-Step Guide
item.description: Learn how to effectively use regex in Grafana queries with this comprehensive guide. Boost your data filtering and visualization skills today.
item.author: hello@signoz.io (SigNoz Inc)

item.title: What is Application Dependency Mapping - A Complete Guide
item.description: Learn how application dependency mapping helps visualize relationships between applications, services, and infrastructure components for better system management and troubleshooting.
item.author: hello@signoz.io (SigNoz Inc)

item.title: How to Calculate Average Memory Usage in Prometheus
item.description: Learn how to calculate average memory usage in Prometheus using PromQL. Discover advanced queries, visualization techniques, and best practices for effective memory monitoring.

item.title: Can Jaeger Show Metrics? - How to Monitor and Visualize Performance

item.title: How to Change Prometheus Port - A Step-by-Step Guide

item.title: Where are Docker Logs Stored? - Docker Logs Location
item.description: Docker container logs are stored in subdirectories under `/var/lib/docker/containers/` on Linux hosts and in `C:\\ProgramData\\docker\\containers` on Windows hosts.
